svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Coal consumption per capita, megawatt-hours per year
Average coal consumption per capita, measured in megawatt-hours (MWh) per person per year.
Source: Fossil fuel consumption per capita - BP & UN (2017 revision)
